newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Caracas stocks end mixed on lack of news.
newsitem.headline: Caracas stocks end mixed on lack of news.

text.p: Caracas stocks closed mixed in moderate trade, amid a lack of news to trade on, analysts said.
"It's been a lethargic market today, waiting on news," Merinvest analyst Roberto Issasi said.

The bolsa's 19-share index closed down 0.33 percent at 6,301.21 points as 18 million shares traded worth four billion bolivars ($8.4 million). Merinvest's composite index, which includes telephone company CANTV, meanwhile slipped 0.27 percent to close at 96.97 points.
Among traded issues, 13 fell, 10 rose and eight closed flat.
